## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 30,000 units                            |
| Rationale                         | To ensure sufficient stock over the next 5 days, considering a potential increase in demand, and to leverage the discount threshold of 16,600 units.  |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     |  The recommendation is 10,000 units higher than the player's plan. This ensures ample stock and allows for potential sales fluctuations. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     |  4.5 days (calculated based on current stock + recommended order / forecasted demand) |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   |  6 days                                       |
| Comments                          |  The recommended order size allows for a comfortable buffer to accommodate demand fluctuations.  The discount threshold will also be met, reducing the overall cost. |
